import React, { lazy, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { CBadge, CButton, CButtonGroup, CCard, CCardBody, CCardFooter, CCardHeader, CCol, CProgress, CRow, CCallout } from '@coreui/react' const TestPage = () => { const [name, setName] = useState('no data received') const [code, setCode] = useState('IN') function handleSubmit() { axios.get(`/country/${code}`).then(response => { console.log(response.data) setName(response.data.Name) }) } return (

SpringBoot Backend Testing:


Get a Single Country's Data:



Your Country's Name is: {name}
) } export default TestPage;
